summary: The sinister Dr Watt has an evil scheme going. He's kidnapping beautiful young women and turning them into mannequins to sell to local stores.
cast: Harry H. Corbett|Kenneth Williams|Jim Dale|Charles Hawtrey|Fenella Fielding|Joan Sims|Angela Douglas|Bernard Bresslaw|Peter Butterworth|Jon Pertwee|Michael Ward|Tom Clegg|Billy Cornelius|Norman Mitchell|Frank Thornton|Frank Forsyth|Anthony Sagar|Sally Douglas|Marianne Stone|Denis Blake|Alexandra Dane|Gerald Thomas
keywords: costume horror|mad scientist|carry on|kidnapping|brother sister relationship
title: Carry On Screaming!
